explains: n. 采访者，面试官，接见者

sentences.en: She made a good impression on the interviewer.
sentences.cn: 她给主持面试者留下了很好的印象。

sentences.en: A TV interviewer must be careful not to offend.
sentences.cn: 电视采访者必须小心别得罪人。

sentences.en: The interviewer asked me about my future plans.
sentences.cn: 采访者问了我的未来计划。
